parameters.query:
WITH months AS (
  SELECT generate_series(
    DATE_TRUNC('month', DATE '2024-01-01'),
    DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE),
    INTERVAL '1 month'
  ) AS month
),
stores AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT "unitId" FROM customers WHERE "unitId" IS NOT NULL
),
all_months_stores AS (
  SELECT m.month, s."unitId"
  FROM months m
  CROSS JOIN stores s
),
accumulated_base_per_store AS (
  SELECT
    ams.month,
    ams."unitId",
    COUNT(cu.id) AS total_customers_per_store
  FROM all_months_stores ams
  LEFT JOIN customers cu
    ON cu."unitId" = ams."unitId"
    AND cu."createdAt" < (ams.month + INTERVAL '1 month')
  GROUP BY ams.month, ams."unitId"
),
new_customers_per_store AS (
  SELECT 
    DATE_TRUNC('month', "createdAt") AS month,
    "unitId",
    COUNT(*) AS new_customers_in_month
  FROM customers
  WHERE "unitId" IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY month, "unitId"
),
tickets_summary AS (
  SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('month', c.date) AS period,
    c."unitId" AS unit_id,

    COALESCE(SUM(cf.value) FILTER (
      WHERE cu.cpf IS NOT NULL AND c.date >= cu."createdAt"
    ), 0) AS identified_value,
    COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT c.id) FILTER (
      WHERE cu.cpf IS NOT NULL AND c.date >= cu."createdAt"
    ), 0) AS identified_tickets,

    COALESCE(SUM(cf.value) FILTER (
      WHERE cu.cpf IS NULL OR c.date < cu."createdAt"
    ), 0) AS unidentified_value,
    COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT c.id) FILTER (
      WHERE cu.cpf IS NULL OR c.date < cu."createdAt"
    ), 0) AS unidentified_tickets,

    SUM(cf.value) AS total_value,
    COUNT(DISTINCT c.id) AS total_tickets,

    c."unitId"
  FROM coupons c
  LEFT JOIN customers cu ON c.cpf = cu.cpf
  INNER JOIN coupons_finishers cf ON cf."couponId" = c.id
  WHERE c.date >= DATE '2024-01-01'
  GROUP BY period, c."unitId"
),
active_customers_per_store AS (
  SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('month', c.date) AS month,
    c."unitId",
    COUNT(DISTINCT c.cpf) AS active_customers
  FROM coupons c
  INNER JOIN customers cu ON c.cpf = cu.cpf
  WHERE c.date >= DATE '2024-01-01'
    AND cu."createdAt" <= c.date
  GROUP BY month, c."unitId"
),
customers_bought_in_signup_month AS (
  SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('month', cu."createdAt") AS month,
    cu."unitId",
    COUNT(DISTINCT cu.cpf) AS customers_bought_in_signup_month
  FROM customers cu
  INNER JOIN coupons c
    ON c.cpf = cu.cpf
    AND c.date >= cu."createdAt"
    AND DATE_TRUNC('month', c.date) = DATE_TRUNC('month', cu."createdAt")
  WHERE cu."unitId" IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY month, cu."unitId"
),
last_3_full_months_buyers AS (
  SELECT
    m.month AS reference_month,
    c."unitId",
    COUNT(DISTINCT c.cpf) AS customers_bought_last_3_full_months
  FROM months m
  JOIN coupons c
    ON DATE_TRUNC('month', c.date) >= m.month - INTERVAL '3 month'
    AND DATE_TRUNC('month', c.date) < m.month
  JOIN customers cu
    ON c.cpf = cu.cpf
    AND c.date >= cu."createdAt"
  GROUP BY m.month, c."unitId"
),
last_90_days_buyers AS (
  SELECT
    m.month AS reference_month,
    c."unitId",
    COUNT(DISTINCT c.cpf) AS customers_bought_last_90_days
  FROM months m
  JOIN coupons c ON (
    CASE 
      WHEN m.month = DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE) THEN
        CASE 
          WHEN c.date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '90 days'
            AND c.date < CURRENT_DATE THEN TRUE
          ELSE FALSE
        END
      ELSE
        CASE 
          WHEN DATE_TRUNC('month', c.date) >= m.month - INTERVAL '3 months'
            AND DATE_TRUNC('month', c.date) < m.month THEN TRUE
          ELSE FALSE
        END
    END
  )
  INNER JOIN customers cu
    ON c.cpf = cu.cpf
    AND c.date >= cu."createdAt"
  GROUP BY m.month, c."unitId"
)

SELECT
  to_char(ams.month, 'YYYY-MM') AS period,
  ams."unitId" AS unit_id,

  COALESCE(ts.identified_value, 0) AS identified_value,
  COALESCE(ts.identified_tickets, 0) AS identified_tickets,

  COALESCE(ts.unidentified_value, 0) AS unidentified_value,
  COALESCE(ts.unidentified_tickets, 0) AS unidentified_tickets,

  COALESCE(ts.total_value, 0) AS total_value,
  COALESCE(ts.total_tickets, 0) AS total_tickets,

  COALESCE(nc.new_customers_in_month, 0) AS new_customers,
  COALESCE(ba.total_customers_per_store, 0) AS total_customers,
  COALESCE(ac.active_customers, 0) AS active_customers,
  COALESCE(cbsm.customers_bought_in_signup_month, 0) AS customers_bought_in_signup_month,
  COALESCE(l3fm.customers_bought_last_3_full_months, 0) AS customers_bought_last_3_full_months,
  COALESCE(l90d.customers_bought_last_90_days, 0) AS customers_bought_last_90_days

FROM all_months_stores ams
LEFT JOIN tickets_summary ts
  ON ts.period = ams.month
  AND ts.unit_id = ams."unitId"
LEFT JOIN new_customers_per_store nc
  ON nc.month = ams.month
  AND nc."unitId" = ams."unitId"
LEFT JOIN accumulated_base_per_store ba
  ON ba.month = ams.month
  AND ba."unitId" = ams."unitId"
LEFT JOIN active_customers_per_store ac
  ON ac.month = ams.month
  AND ac."unitId" = ams."unitId"
LEFT JOIN customers_bought_in_signup_month cbsm
  ON cbsm.month = ams.month
  AND cbsm."unitId" = ams."unitId"
LEFT JOIN last_3_full_months_buyers l3fm
  ON l3fm.reference_month = ams.month
  AND l3fm."unitId" = ams."unitId"
LEFT JOIN last_90_days_buyers l90d
  ON l90d.reference_month = ams.month
  AND l90d."unitId" = ams."unitId"
ORDER BY ams."unitId", period;
